Key Benefits & Value Proposition

Revenue Optimization

Automated tax collection with multi-channel access (web, USSD, mobile) increases compliance and reduces revenue leakage.

Transparency & Accountability

Real-time dashboards, audit trails, and automated reconciliation ensure full visibility of all transactions.

Citizen Convenience

24/7 access via web and USSD platforms with instant receipts and payment confirmations.

Comprehensive Coverage

Includes everything from development to 2-year support, training for all stakeholders, and full documentation.

Enterprise Security

Bank-grade security with NDPA compliance, regular penetration testing, and disaster recovery protocols.

Seamless Integration

Connects with FIRS, CAC, NIMC, 20+ banks, and all major payment gateways for complete ecosystem coverage.
